sentences.en: Cats never fail to fascinate human beings.
sentences.cn: 猫总能让人类产生极大的兴趣.

sentences.en: Cats never fail to fascinate human beings.
sentences.cn: 猫总能引起人们的极大兴趣.

sentences.en: I be extremely fascinate by the story.
I believed devoutly in her power to fascinate him, in her dazzling loveliness.
sentences.cn: 我由衷地相信她有使他神魂颠倒的力量, 相信她有令人眼花缭乱的姿色.

sentences.en: I like work; It fascinate me; I can sit and look It for hour.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢工作; 他使我着迷; 我能够对着它坐上几个钟头.

sentences.en: It began to fascinate me and one thing led to another.
sentences.cn: 它开始吸引我,让我越来越对它入迷.
政治让富兰克林的父亲着迷。

sentences.en: Sequoias fascinate people . They fascinate people by their size and age . They simply exceed human dimensions.
sentences.cn: 红杉魅力无穷,其树身之大,寿命之长,令人赞叹,简直不可想像.

sentences.en: Sequoias fascinate people by their size and age.
sentences.cn: 红杉魅力无穷,其树身之大,寿命之长,令人赞叹.

sentences.en: Snakes are said to fascinate small animals.
Snakes are said to fascinate small birds.
The cute aspect that she read the cartoon book fascinate me.
sentences.cn: 看到她上课时看漫画时可爱的样子我都着迷.

sentences.en: The idea of travelling through time fascinates me.
sentences.cn: 穿越时光的想法深深吸引着我。

sentences.en: The place continues to fascinate visitors, cloaked in its mystery.
sentences.cn: 这个地方笼罩在神秘气氛下,继续使游览者着迷.

sentences.en: These things never get old , and always manage to fascinate.
sentences.cn: 这些东西从来不会过时, 并且一直创新着.

sentences.en: Two of the many aspects of this problem increasingly fascinate and provoke the writer.
sentences.cn: 在这对这个问题众多的研究中,有两个方面越来越引人瞩目.

sentences.en: What is the stimulating message of this creature specifically designed to fascinate small children?
sentences.cn: 而这个被设计成非常吸引小孩子的形象正在启发孩子什么 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 迷人的；吸引人的；使人神魂颠倒的
使着迷；使陶醉（fascinate的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: if someone or something fascinates you, you are attracted to them and think they are extremely interesting
if someone or something fascinates you, you are attracted to them and think they are extremely interesting
if someone or something fascinates you, you are attracted to them and think they are extremely interesting
